channel.title: Untagged on Tabletop Ergonomics
channel.description: Recent content in Untagged on Tabletop Ergonomics

item.title: Touchstone Video Games
item.description: I like immersive sims & related games Deus Ex, MGSV Hitman Trilogy, Dishonored, Dark Messiah I like skill expression flow state games (racing, extreme sports, STG’s) I didn’t play WoW seriously until I was 30 lmao you could buy another game for $15 My reference for fantasy gaming was Diablo and Gauntlet 64 lmao who the hell is Black Isle? I only got the point recently (about things our world is not about)

item.title: What Are We Playing?
item.description: invisible rulebooks play culture sidebar: I’m okay with “neotrad” as a distinct variant of trad. cross between theater kid D&D and OC culture. I like my weird OC’s.
